event.title: BSUG Christmas Party
event.description:
Our Christmas Party will be similar to most of our networking events, but maybe some light hearted "agile" party games thrown in.

We are in the process of gathering some prizes for a special Christmas raffle. Only attendees of this event will be entered into the draw! And your chances of winning will increase with the number of meetups you have attended his year!

Prizes & Sponsors

Nokia Lumia 820 (Nokia)

£100 Amazon Vouchers (Scrum Alliance)

£50 Amazon Vouchers (Scrum Alliance)

£25 Amazon Vouchers (Scrum Alliance)

FREE seat on any Agilify public training course in 2013 (Agilify)

 

I'll also like to use this event to discuss goals, plans and leadership of the group in 2013.

Look forward to seeing you all there!
